Description: © craigslist - Map data © OpenStreetMap(google map)condition: good make / manufacturer: Gibson model name / number: SG Standard This is a 2005 Gibson SG Standard in Heritage Cherry Red. Comes with the original Gibson hardshell case and cloth cover. Case has a few wear spots, but completely functional and free of odors. Rosewood fretboard, chrome hardware, 490R and 498T pickups, Tune-o-matic bridge, and rounded '50s style neck profile. Comes with brand new Schaller Strap Locks installed (don't have the originals). Has a few nicks and minor scratches, slight indentation on the neck pickup cover, and one tiny ding on the fretboard within the first fret - hardly noticeable doesn't effect playing at all. This SG sounds amazing and is a blast to play. Great clean jazzy and amazing distorted tones only found from an iconic SG.Manufactured on March 30th, 2005, Production Number: 61 The Gibson SG is a legendary instrument and needs no introduction. Below is a list of guitarists who have made it famous: Angus Young (AC-DC), Tony Iommi (Black Sabbath), Jerry Garcia (Grateful Dead), Derek Trucks (Derek Trucks Band), Frank Zappa, Frank Marino, Carlos Santana, Eric Clapton (Cream), Pete Townshend (The Who)..etc.
Title: 2005 GIBSON SG STANDARD USA
